---
title: "Amazon Employee Access Challenge"
output: html_notebook
---


1. Load the data
```{r}
train <- read.csv("train.csv")
test <- read.csv("test.csv")

str(train)

```


2. Checking NA values
```{r}
sapply(train, function(x) sum(is.na(x)))

sapply(train, function(x) length(unique(x)))

```

3. Removing column MGR_ID and ROLE_TITLE

```{r}

train <- train[,-3]
str(train)

train <- train[,-6]

```

4. Fitting the model


```{r}


model <- glm(ACTION ~., family = binomial(link = 'logit'), data = train)
summary(model)



```


5. Predicting test data
```{r}
result <- predict(model, test, type = "response")


result <- ifelse(result > 0.87,1,0)

```



6.Writing resultes to a file

```{r}
submit_result <- cbind(test$id, result)

result <- submit_result[1:58921,]

write.csv(result, file = "Result.csv")
```
